info.title: Security Audit Log for SIEM integration
info.description: You can use the audit log data to integrate them into your Security Information and Event Management solution (SIEM) to detect security-relevant event situations.

x-sap-shortText: This service enables you to retrieve the Security Audit Log data

tags.name: SIEM API for Security Audit Log
